title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 17.4 - Modifications to standard claim forms
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 17.4 - Modifications to standard claim forms

State Regulations
(a) A commercial insurer or an article IX-C corporation may add to the claim form its own identification and similar information; however, no alteration may be made to the format of the standard claim form. (b) Attachments to the standard claim forms by physicians and dentists, in lieu of completion of a portion of the claim forms, are permitted when the attachment is part of an office and bookkeeping system, provides information consistent with that required in the standard claim form, and is not found objectionable by the superintendent. Notes

17.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
